title: Did a Florida Judge Give Vastly Different Sentences to Two Men, Whose Only Difference Was Their Race?
subtitle: A viral meme, based on a piece of investigative journalism, left out some important context in the cases of Chase Legleitner and Lamar Lloyd.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Florida 19th Judicial Circuit judge Sherwood "Chip" Bauer gave a black man 26 years in prison and a white man two years' time served, for the same crime, in the same circumstances.
